name: Laboratory with Electricity and Monster Problems
name_original: Laboratory with Electricity and Monster Problems
description:
LEMP - Demo Internship offer

Hello futur intern! Welcome to LEMP, the world number one high technology laboratory according to us!

Here at LEMP we are a big  and loving family, we're passionate about our work so we don't count hours! And we don't pay them, who need money when you got love right?

Our qualified staff will give you missions with great responsibilities, such as petting the dogs, watering the plantes, and sort boxes!

There are monsters in our laboratory for our experiences, but don't worry everything in under control, they don't escape that often.

Please join your CV, a 3 page motivation letter, references and proof of at least 5 other work experiences. 

Do not miss this one-of-a-lifetime opportunity and join our big and loving family!

Welcome to LEMP!

Controls

W/A/S/D or arrows: Walk

Hold Shift: Run

E: Interact

Hold E: Use

Credits

Florian Launay : Game Design, Art, Tech Art

Lisa Fontaine : Game Design, Programming,

Musics: Funk Game Loop by Kevin MacLeod (License) and Funkorama by Kevin MacLeod (License)

Sounds: Zapsplat.com and Kenney.com
